innerText: 211. Dutiyassa paṭhame parisaṃ dūsentīti parisadūsanā. Parisaṃ sobhentīti parisasobhanā.

children: . Dutiye manoduccarite pariyāpannāpi micchādiṭṭhi mahāsāvajjatāya visuṃ vuttā, tassā ca paṭipakkhavasena sammādiṭṭhi.
innerText: 212. Dutiye manoduccarite pariyāpannāpi micchādiṭṭhi mahāsāvajjatāya visuṃ vuttā, tassā ca paṭipakkhavasena sammādiṭṭhi.

children: ti akataññutāya akataveditāya. Ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekameva. Sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.
innerText: 213. Tatiye akataññutā akataveditāti akataññutāya akataveditāya. Ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekameva. Sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.

children: . Catutthaṃ catunnaṃ kammakilesānaṃ tappaṭipakkhassa ca vasena vuttaṃ, pañcamaṃ sukkapakkhānaṃ ādito catunnaṃ micchattānaṃ vasena, chaṭṭhaṃ avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ, sattamaṃ anariyavohāraariyavohārānaṃ. Tathā

aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni sappaṭipakkhānaṃ assaddhammānaṃ vasena vuttāni. Sabbasuttesu pana sukkapakkhadhammā lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitā. Navasu suttesu kiñcāpi ‘‘sagge’’ti vuttaṃ, tayo pana maggā tīṇi ca phalāni labbhantiyevāti.
innerText: 214-217. Catutthaṃ catunnaṃ kammakilesānaṃ tappaṭipakkhassa ca vasena vuttaṃ, pañcamaṃ sukkapakkhānaṃ ādito catunnaṃ micchattānaṃ vasena, chaṭṭhaṃ avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ, sattamaṃ anariyavohāraariyavohārānaṃ. Tathā aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni sappaṭipakkhānaṃ assaddhammānaṃ vasena vuttāni. Sabbasuttesu pana sukkapakkhadhammā lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitā. Navasu suttesu kiñcāpi ‘‘sagge’’ti vuttaṃ, tayo pana maggā tīṇi ca phalāni labbhantiyevāti.
